roleset.name: occurring at different times (contrasts with recurrence: a metachronous cancer is a new, different cancer, not a recurrence of the prior cancer)

role.descr: prior thing that's being distinguished from ARG1

example.name: metachronous-j
example.text: #1 Metachronous colon cancer with synchronous colon lesions.
example.amr: (c / cancer-03 :li 1 :pl + :ARG2 (a / anatomical-site :primary + :name (n / name :op1 "colon")) :ARG1-of (m / metachronous-01) :subevent (s / sign-symptom :pl + :name (n2 / name :op1 "lesion") :location a :ARG1-of (s / synchronous-02)))
